Articles.Content:
Until C7 releases that plugin he\'s been working on.

OOoo.

Also another question, where is the parts pack of C7 pods turned into normal parts?

I\'m having issues with your .craft files. At first it was a \'missing part\' warning, but it turned out I hadn\'t properly installed the C7 basic pack, so that fixed that. Now, though, I\'m having an issue where they fall apart before I get a chance to launch. I\'m sure I installed everything (and if I hadn\'t, wouldn\'t it just give me \'missing part\' warnings instead of loading but falling apart?), so it\'s not that...
Interesting, great idea too! I\'ve come up with a ship that launches a plane in the air... But not nearly as complex as this! Someone make this guy an admiral for the KSP navy or something! =P
I present to you the carrier, Hudbert!
err sorry screenshots don\'t work... just download if you wanna see it

err sorry screenshots don\'t work... just download if you wanna see it

Even saved they don\'t work
I meant the ship

That is just too cool.

If only there were a way to control the ship after launching...

Perhaps you could add some heavy yaw control to the plane? That way, when you are landed, you can still steer the boat.

Well now that isnt a problem due to the .14 release

Well now that isnt a problem due to the .14 release

*Looks around*

I forgot about that...

I shall return with a carrier!
This is amazing. Not only the carriers, but that little X-7 is far more manoeuvrable than my equivalent, the KSF F-1.
I cant wait tell someone models up a real aircraft carrier!

I cant wait tell someone models up a real aircraft carrier!

That would remove the challenge of making one.
Very nice, very creative .

That would remove the challenge of making one.

Yes , but it would add the whole new challenge of getting it off the pad and into the sea...

Yes , but it would add the whole new challenge of getting it off the pad and into the sea...

Let\'s admit it. You shouldn\'t have to do that.
The Hermes is so kick ass!!! You are a genius!

((yes, I know this is a necro, but I have stuff to add so shaddap))

I tried to download the aircraft carrier part you provided, but the archive is corrupt. Can anyone give a mirror?

I made an alternative part.

Download link:

http://www.2shared.com/file/15wVoQrJ/VA_C7_Landing_Board.html

Use Hardpoints.

I made an alternative part.

Download link:

http://www.2shared.com/file/15wVoQrJ/VA_C7_Landing_Board.html

Use Hardpoints.

I can\'t even figure out how the hell that site is meant to work. Can you upload it via attachment please?

((yes, I know this is a necro, but I have stuff to add so shaddap))

I tried to download the aircraft carrier part you provided, but the archive is corrupt. Can anyone give a mirror?

It works now, just reuploaded it

I can\'t even figure out how the hell that site is meant to work. Can you upload it via attachment please?

You click \'Download\'.

If it says \'Download Now\', you\'re seeing an advert.

Uh, what spaceplane pack?

link?

he is most likely talking about c7 parts which is this.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1172.0

Your aircraft carrier already has to fly to get to the water anyway!

This thing is completely nuts!

Can\'t wait to see what you make next!

Awesome stuff! This is actually really awesome. This would be really useful for landing on any future planets with liquids on their surface, or even just sending an expedition to the other side of Kerbin. I really hope things like those amphibious landing gear are added, but I doubt it until we have another planet with liquids.
